type.description:
## Movement Blocking

---


[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/movement_blocking)

Checks whether the block is marked in code as blocking movement and doesn't have an empty collision shape.

Type ID: `origins:movement_blocking`

---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:movement_blocking"
}
```

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Movement Blocking (Block Condition Type) date: 2021-04-05

Movement Blocking

Block Condition Type

Checks whether the block is marked in code as blocking movement and doesn't have an empty collision shape.

Type ID: origins:movement_blocking

Fields

None.

Examples

"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:movement_blocking"
}
